title: GoPro Hero 11 Black - SD Card & Battery Errors
summary: Handling SD card formatting and cold weather battery performance.
content:
SD Card Error: Ensure you are using a V30 or UHS-3 rated card. To format: Swipe down > Preferences > Reset > Format SD Card. 

Cold Weather: Use the Enduro battery (white cap). Standard batteries may shut down in temps below 0°C even if charged.
